Package nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model.drawingtool

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CircleDrawingTool
    A CircleDrawingTool is a DrawingTool with a circular shape.
    DrawingTool
    A DrawingTool is a shape that a user can use to draw on the canvas.
    SquareDrawingTool
    A SquareDrawingTool is a DrawingTool with a square shape.
